question.questionA: Annuals; flowers whitish; wing  petals with three distinct, branched, non-anastomosing veins.
question.questionB: Perennials; flowers white, pink or blue; veins on wing petals either indistinct or anastomosing.

question.questionA: Flowers pink; three veins on wing petals indistinct and closely aligned, appearing as a single vein.
question.questionB: Flowers  white,  pink  or  blue; wing petals with three distinct but anastomosing veins.
